name: RealSam
0:
”Alexa, ask real sam to list books”
”tell me about all you have”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: real sam
Developer Terms of Use
des: RealSam is a simple way for blind and vision impaired people to access audiobooks and other media. To get started, say find books by Charles Dickens. Also try, User Guide.
